name: Agility Professional Services
overview: Agility Professional Services LLC, an IT consulting company, provides application development, and healthcare information technology and services. It offers electronic health records consulting and implementation services. The company’s electronic medical records products offer patient scheduling, patient management, billing, connectivity, e-prescribing, secure messaging, referrals, reporting, document management, and template creating services. It also offers infrastructure solutions, which include analysis, design, and implementation of voice and data networks; installation of communications cabling in facilities; and inter connectivity of multi-office sites. In addition, the company implements billing solutions, as well as provides Web based and client server electronic health records, IT infrastructure, and billing solutions. It serves healthcare providers. Agility Professional Services LLC was founded in 2009 and is based in Fort Lee, New Jersey.
